participant_1.background:
I do not see my family very often, but I am close to them.
My spouse is a software engineer and my child is a preschooler.
i have 2 sisters.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
i like classic radio programs.

participant_2.background:
I read my favorite book Twilight on the beach while on vacation.
i used to work as an actress.
i also dance and sing.
my favorite food is sushi.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

content.text: I like to read and dance.
Oh, I like to read classic radio programs. I wish I could dance, but I have two left feet!
You should take some lessons! Dancing is really fun.
I might try that. I love sushi, too. What is your favorite food?
My favorite food is sushi. I love the taste and texture.
I've never tried it. Is it hard to find a good place to get sushi?
Not really. There are a lot of good sushi places in my city.
Maybe I'll try it sometime. I'm not a big seafood fan, though.
You should try it anyway. There are a lot of different kinds of sushi, and you might find one you like.
I'll give it a try. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read, dance, and sing. I also enjoy my quiet life and green tea.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests. I like to read, watch movies, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a nice life. I'm glad you have a lot of interests.
Thanks. I'm glad you're enjoying your life, too.
